trans-unit.source:
\n

Provides methods and properties for compressing and decompressing streams by using the Deflate algorithm.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xx xxxxx xxx Xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The stream to compress.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

One of the enumeration values that indicates whether to emphasize speed or compression efficiency when compressing the stream.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx xx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source: stream is null.

The stream to compress.

\n

One of the enumeration values that indicates whether to emphasize speed or compression efficiency when compressing the stream.

One of the enumeration values that indicates whether to compress or decompress the stream.

\n

The stream to compress or decompress.

\n

trans-unit.source:
\n

One of the enumeration values that indicates whether to compress or decompress the stream.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source: stream is null.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets a reference to the underlying stream.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx x xxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A stream object that represents the underlying stream.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxxxx xxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The underlying stream is closed.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets a value indicating whether the stream supports reading while decompressing a file.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx x xxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxxxxxx x xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets a value indicating whether the stream supports seeking.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx x xxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source: false in all cases.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets a value indicating whether the stream supports writing.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx x xxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A long value.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

This property is not supported on this stream.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A long value.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

This property is not supported on this stream.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source: true to release both managed and unmanaged resources; false to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx$ $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The current implementation of this method has no functionality.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxxxxx xx xxxx xxxxxx xxx xx xxxxxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The stream is closed.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Reads a number of decompressed bytes into the specified byte array.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxx x xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxxxxx xxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The array to store decompressed bytes.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xx xxxxx xxxxxxxxxxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The byte offset in array at which the read bytes will be placed.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xxxxxx xx $xx$xxxxx$$xx$ xx xxxxx xxx xxxx xxxxx xxxx xx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The maximum number of decompressed bytes to read.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxxxxx xxxxx xx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The number of bytes that were read into the byte array.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxx xxxx xxxx xxxx xxxx xxx xxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source: array is null.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xx$xxxxx$$xx$ xx $xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
offset or count is less than zero.

-or-

array length minus the index starting point is less than count.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xx$xxxxxx$$xx$ xx $xx$xxxxx$$xx$ xx xxxx xxxx xxxx.$$x$$x$x$$xx$$$x$$x$x$$x$xx$xxxxx$$xx$ xxxxxx xxxxx xxx xxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxx xx xxxx xxxx $xx$xxxxx$$xx$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The data is in an invalid format.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xx xx xxxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The stream is closed.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The location in the stream.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A long value.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

This property is not supported on this stream.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The length of the stream.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

This property is not supported on this stream.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Writes compressed bytes to the underlying stream from the specified byte array.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The buffer that contains the data to compress.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxx xxx xxxx xx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The byte offset in array from which the bytes will be read.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xxxxxx xx $xx$xxxxx$$xx$ xxxx xxxxx xxx xxxxx xxxx xx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The maximum number of bytes to write.
